languages.text: "Признаться, и я впервые слышу об этой планете. Вероятно, Летус был одной из тех тайн, в детали которой посвящаются единицы — и лишь единицы из единиц, исполнив предписанную часть договора... остаются в живых".

"To be honest, this is the first time I am hearing of this planet as well. Leethus must have been one of those secrets whose details only a select few are privy to — and even fewer among those few ever get to live once their purpose has been fulfilled."
languages.original_text: "Признаться, и я впервые слышу об этой планете. Вероятно, Летус был одной из тех тайн, в детали которой посвящаются единицы — и лишь единицы из единиц, исполнив предписанную часть договора... остаются в живых".

traits.locale_text: "To be honest, this is the first time I am hearing of this planet as well. Leethus must have been one of those secrets whose details only a select few are privy to — and only a few among those few carry out their end of the deal... and live."

"To be honest, this is the first time I am hearing of this planet as well. Leethus must have been one of those secrets whose details only a select few are privy to — and only a few among those few carry out their end of the deal... and live."

languages.text: 「正直に申し上げますと、私もこの惑星のことを耳にするのはこれが初めてでございます。リーザスは、おそらく限られた方々にしか知らされない秘密でございます。しかも、その限られた方々の中でさえ、目的を果たした後に生き延びることはさらに稀でございます」
languages.original_text: "To be honest, this is the first time I am hearing of this planet as well. Leethus must have been one of those secrets whose details only a select few are privy to — and even fewer among those few ever get to live once their purpose has been fulfilled."

traits.locale_text: 「正直に申し上げますと、私もこの惑星のことを耳にするのはこれが初めてでございます。リーザスは、おそらく限られた方々にしか知らされない秘密でございます。しかも、その限られた方々の中でさえ、目的を果たした後に生き延びることはさらに稀でございます」

languages.text: «A decir verdad, es la primera noticia que tengo de ese planeta. Leethus debe de ser uno de esos secretos de los que solo unos pocos son conscientes, y a los que menos aún sobreviven una vez terminada su parte en el proceso».
languages.original_text: "To be honest, this is the first time I am hearing of this planet as well. Leethus must have been one of those secrets whose details only a select few are privy to — and even fewer among those few ever get to live once their purpose has been fulfilled."

traits.locale_text: «A decir verdad, es la primera noticia que tengo de ese planeta. Leethus debe de ser uno de esos secretos de los que solo unos pocos son conscientes, y a los que menos aún sobreviven una vez terminada su parte en el proceso».

languages.text: « Très franchement, je n'avais moi non plus jamais entendu parler de cette planète. Leethus doit être l'un de ces secrets uniquement connus d'une poignée d'élus. Et parmi ces derniers, bien peu survivent une fois leur rôle accompli. »
languages.original_text: "To be honest, this is the first time I am hearing of this planet as well. Leethus must have been one of those secrets whose details only a select few are privy to — and even fewer among those few ever get to live once their purpose has been fulfilled."

traits.locale_text: « Très franchement, je n'avais moi non plus jamais entendu parler de cette planète. Leethus doit être l'un de ces secrets uniquement connus d'une poignée d'élus. Et parmi ces derniers, bien peu survivent une fois leur rôle accompli. »

languages.text: “说实话，这也是我第一次听说这颗行星。利瑟斯这个秘密，肯定只有极少数人知道其中的细节——而在这些人之中，等到一切结束之后还能活下来的人，恐怕更是寥寥无几。”
languages.original_text: "To be honest, this is the first time I am hearing of this planet as well. Leethus must have been one of those secrets whose details only a select few are privy to — and even fewer among those few ever get to live once their purpose has been fulfilled."

traits.locale_text: “说实话，这也是我第一次听说这颗行星。利瑟斯这个秘密，肯定只有极少数人知道其中的细节——而在这些人之中，等到一切结束之后还能活下来的人，恐怕更是寥寥无几。”

languages.text: "Ich höre ehrlich gesagt auch zum ersten Mal von diesem Planeten. Leethus muss eines dieser Geheimnisse gewesen sein, die nur einigen Wenigen bekannt sind ... und von diesen Wenigen überleben noch weniger, wenn sie ihren Zweck erfüllt haben."
languages.original_text: "To be honest, this is the first time I am hearing of this planet as well. Leethus must have been one of those secrets whose details only a select few are privy to — and even fewer among those few ever get to live once their purpose has been fulfilled."

traits.locale_text: "Ich höre ehrlich gesagt auch zum ersten Mal von diesem Planeten. Leethus muss eines dieser Geheimnisse gewesen sein, die nur einigen Wenigen bekannt sind ... und von diesen Wenigen überleben noch weniger, wenn sie ihren Zweck erfüllt haben."

languages.text: "Dürüst olmak gerekirse bu gezegenin adını ben de ilk kez duyuyorum. Leethus, sırlarını sadece bir avuç seçkinin bildiği o gizemlerden biri olmalı... O bir avuç dolusu insandan pek azına, görevlerini tamamladıktan sonra yaşama şansı tanınmıştır."
languages.original_text: "To be honest, this is the first time I am hearing of this planet as well. Leethus must have been one of those secrets whose details only a select few are privy to — and even fewer among those few ever get to live once their purpose has been fulfilled."

traits.locale_text: "Dürüst olmak gerekirse bu gezegenin adını ben de ilk kez duyuyorum. Leethus, sırlarını sadece bir avuç seçkinin bildiği o gizemlerden biri olmalı... O bir avuç dolusu insandan pek azına, görevlerini tamamladıktan sonra yaşama şansı tanınmıştır."
